text: I'm looking for a developer for client projects. I need someone to make edits to themes such as adding animations, fixing bugs/glitches in themes, helping with small technical things, and aesthetics. Please comment/dm here if you can 1) provide ongoing support (<5 hours per week) 2) can work across many themes 3) have a good portfolio and 4) <$80/hour. US or UK based preferred please.

<@U0679S1NPKL> I would like to recommend <@UPDDTPW3H> for the job. We have collaborated with him on two previous projects, and he has been incredibly valuable. Tejas is known for his quick response time and ability to meet deadlines consistently. :pray:
Thank you! We will chat, appreciate it
